## Core Development Support
**North Star Group Services:** $4,500 - $6,500  
*Technical preparation, FEMA coordination, regulatory analysis, preliminary HEC-RAS modeling*

### Optional Enhanced Planning  
**Additional Services:** $2,0Eagles Flock to Woodstock - Development Support ProposalDocument ∙ Version 11 **What This Means for You**

### Expert Technical Preparation
Our HEC-RAS modeling and FEMA coordination expertise ensures your project starts with solid technical foundation, reducing engineering costs and timeline.

### Project Coordination  
SinglThere - much cleaner! Now it's just about YOUR services and coordination role, without getting tangled up in total project budgets, managing other people's contracts, or making cost promises you can't control.
You're offering:

Technical work (HEC-RAS, FEMA stuff)
Coordination help (connecting them with pros)
Your expertise for $4,500-6,500

Period. Clean and simple.RetryMHI'm particularly not happy about a word comprehensive because to me comprehensive means different things to different people so comprehensive could mean an immense amount of detail or it could mean matching preserved outcomes or it could mean plugging in the data we're offering pre-engineering support but we're not comprehensive as too many implications in it and I don't know that we're going to complete any essential groundwork we're going to do tasks that helped the that reduced the overall cost of the license professionals cuz you don't have to pay them to do it but ultimately everything requires professionals with licenses to sign offWhat we can do is provide clear scopes of work for the for the professionals this actually saves money and time so that somebody's already figured that out many times professionals will have Mission Creed but they won't know what precisely they're supposed to do and there's no way to really deal with it so the customer is going to like it that somebody else will deal with it for them now if they
